mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL , R.REPLY_ID , R.BOARD_ID , R.EMAIL , R.CONTENT , TO_CHAR(R.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , TO_CAHR(R.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , R.RECOMMEND_CNT , R.PARENT_REPLY_ID , M.NAME FROM REPLIES R INNER JOIN BOARD B ON R.BOARD_ID = B.ID INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON R.EMAIL = M.EMAIL START WITH R.PARENT_REPLY_ID = 0 AND R.BOARD_ID = #{_parameter} CONNECT BY PRIOR R.REPLY_ID = R.PARENT_REPLY_ID

SELECT R.REPLY_ID , R.BOARD_ID , R.EMAIL , R.CONTENT , TO_CHAR(R.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(R.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , R.RECOMMEND_CNT , R.PARENT_REPLY_ID , M.NAME FROM REPLIES R INNER JOIN BOARD B ON R.BOARD_ID = B.ID INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON R.EMAIL = M.EMAIL WHERE R.REPLY_ID = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLIES ( REPLY_ID , BOARD_ID , EMAIL , CONTENT , CRT_DT , MDFY_DT , RECOMMEND_CNT , PARENT_REPLY_ID) VALUES ( SEQ_REPLIES_PK.NEXTVAL , #{boardId} , #{email} , #{content} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , 0 , #{parentReplyId} )
